games.name: Counter-Strike 2
games.gpu: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580
games.bio: Counter-Strike 2 is the latest iteration of the legendary tactical shooter from Valve, featuring updated graphics and physics.

games.name: Valorant
games.bio: Valorant is a tactical shooter developed by Riot Games, known for its precision gunplay and unique agent abilities.

games.name: Fortnite
games.bio: Fortnite is a battle royale game with building mechanics, developed by Epic Games, featuring vibrant visuals and creative gameplay.

games.name: Marvel Rivals
games.gpu: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5700
games.bio: Marvel Rivals is an upcoming team-based multiplayer shooter featuring Marvel superheroes and villains in action-packed battles.

games.name: Rainbow Six Siege
games.gpu: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 / AMD Radeon R9 280X
games.bio: Rainbow Six Siege is a tactical shooter emphasizing strategy, teamwork, and destructible environments.

games.name: Apex Legends
games.gpu: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
games.bio: Apex Legends is a free-to-play battle royale set in the Titanfall universe, featuring unique legends and fast-paced gameplay.

games.name: Dota 2
games.gpu: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 / AMD Radeon HD 7750
games.bio: Dota 2 is a legendary MOBA developed by Valve, featuring deep strategy and intense 5v5 battles.
